name: Power Pop Match 3 Mania
description:
It's the real match 3 mania- Play Power Pop Match 3 Mania and match shiny gems and diamonds to win coins!
Power Pop Match 3 is an addicting and fun puzzle game, free to play and completely relaxing. Play now and explore thousands of strong levels, blast colorful diamonds and unlock awesome boosters. This completely addictive game will keep you occupied for hours.

The force of beautiful gems is in your hand!
Download Power Pop Match 3 Mania puzzle game, blast and explode powerful diamond matches and unlock new levels to complete all the challenges. Blast your way through the amazing match 3 pop puzzle game filled with amazing graphics, unique items, and splendid power-ups. Create amazing combos and solve the brain teasers to blast away and win exciting rewards.


Create special fever combos and power-ups to get a blast pop explosion!
- Match 4 gems to get a striped item of this color and create a line blast.
- Match 5 lovely items in an L or T form to get a bomb that will explode surrounding items.
- Match and blast pop 5 colorful figures in a row to get a rainbow blast.

Why you’ll like it:
💎Exciting match 3 puzzle game levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters, power-ups, and explosive combos.
💎Addictive matching gameplay: swap and match fire gems, and be part of a breathtaking adventure!
💎Fun match game with simple, casual gameplay that’s easy to learn but can be challenging to master.
💎Beautiful graphics and effects.
💎There is no time limit, so you can play as much as you like.
💎Completely FREE game to play and enjoy.

Reach high scores and try to get three stars on every level by matching gems. Play this incredible gems game puzzle today, and get ready for an addictive ride. Play now, earn treasure coins, and solve the brain teasers to blast them away and win exciting rewards!

How to Play Power Pop Match 3 Mania:
+ Match strong diamonds and solve the puzzles to remove them from the board and win points.
+ Complete the missions set at the beginning of each exciting level.
+ Encounter tons of exciting boosters and surprises!
+ Try to get three stars at every level so you can earn even more treasure coins.
+ Enjoy a free game, win rewards and beat difficult levels.

Play and enjoy this fun board gems game for free! Use amazing boosters that will help you smash all the fire items to win levels. This match game is amazing and fun, super addictive, and we can’t promise you won’t fall in love with this super matching adventure!
